long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nostalgia Items + Productivity == RetroTasker

Your browser-based to-do list, wrapped in classic styles like pixel, 8bit, windows, mac, frutiger aero,,, etc.  Say goodbye to cluttered planners and the hassle of switching between tabs. 

It's more than just a to-do list extension. It's a journey back to simpler times, where productivity meets nostalgia in perfect harmony. Say hello to streamlined tasks, real-time progress tracking, and your favorite music—all in one delightful package.

Imagine endless tasks at your fingertips, seamlessly organized within your browser. No more fumbling with physical planners or cluttered apps. RetroTasker offers unlimited task creation, allowing you to jot down every detail without hesitation.

But that's not all. Real-time deadline and day countdowns keep you on track, ensuring you never miss a beat. Need to focus on specific tasks? The collapsible layouts feature lets you tailor your workspace to your needs, minimizing distractions and maximizing efficiency.

And here's where RetroTasker truly shines: the unique ability to play your favorite tunes from YouTube without disrupting your workflow. 

But productivity isn't just about ticking boxes, it's about progress. With RetroTasker, a quick glance reveals the percentage of tasks completed, motivating you to push forward and achieve more.

With RetroTasker, you dive into a streamlined productivity without sacrificing your love for retro aesthetics.
